tweets.content:
Cool feature just dropped for 
@SuperGrok
 subscribers. 

Turn on Companions in settings.
Next I’m buying Coca-Cola to put the cocaine back in
I hope that even my worst critics remain on Twitter, because that is what free speech means
The future is gonna be so

combined_text:
Cool feature just dropped for 
@SuperGrok
 subscribers. 

Turn on Companions in settings.

Next I’m buying Coca-Cola to put the cocaine back in

13 Jul 2024

I hope that even my worst critics remain on Twitter, because that is what free speech means

The future is gonna be so

Let’s make Twitter maximum fun!

Yesss!!!
summary: @SuperGrok has a new feature called "Companions" which you can turn on and off. Turn it on when you want to interact with people on twitter. Turn it off when you don't want to interact. You can also add your own jokes or anything else you like. Let's make Twitter maximum fun! Yesss!!!
